sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- 模板代码保持不变 -->
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    let typeId = this.$route.query.id;
    return {
      user: JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("xm-user") || "{}"),
      typeId: typeId,
      goodsData: [],
      recommendData: [],
      typeData: {},
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    this.loadGoods();
    this.loadType();
    this.loadRecommend();
  },
  methods: {
    loadRecommend() {
      this.$request.get("/goods/recommend").then((res) => {
        if (res.code === "200") {
          // 对 recommendData 按 id 升序排序
          this.recommendData = res.data.sort((a, b) => a.id - b.id);
        } else {
          this.$message.error(res.msg);
        }
      });
    },
    loadType() {
      this.$request.get("/type/selectById/" + this.typeId).then((res) => {
        if (res.code === "200") {
          this.typeData = res.data;
        } else {
          this.$message.error(res.msg);
        }
      });
    },
    loadGoods() {
      this.$request
        .get("/goods/selectByTypeId?id=" + this.typeId)
        .then((res) => {
          if (res.code === "200") {
            // 对 goodsData 按 id 升序排序
            this.goodsData = res.data.sort((a, b) => a.id - b.id);
          } else {
            this.$message.error(res.msg);
          }
        });
    },
    navTo(url) {
      location.href = url;
    },
  },
};
</script>
